dataList.dlg: Huff, let's skip the formalities. What do I need to do?
I normally spend my morning meditating. I have to cleanse my mind of distractions.
Haah, why is everyone so noisy around noon? Can't they have their meals quietly?
Phew... I can finally have some peace and quiet. Please don't talk to me. I need the rest.
Knh... Give me a moment. My, my head, it's shattering... Ahh... I'm better now. It's happening a lot recently.
I must remain focused at all times. In other words, I can't afford to engage in unimportant chitchats with you.
Unh... If you see my antlers vibrating like they're about to break, tell everyone to evacuate...

Manager, hypothetically speaking... in the slightest chance that I lose my mind...
If that does occur... Can your clock reverse that, too?

Keeping a tight rein on my sanity... entails maintaining conscious control even in my sleep.
I don't remember how a deep sleep feels anymore.
You're doing one of my least favorite things right now: summoning me here only to leave me behind.
Hngh... Haah, I feel my power has grown more potent... But my headache's gotten worse, too...
Kngh... I'm, ready.
Let's hurry up and get to it.
I'm in my right mind... for now.
Huff... Engaging in combat.
Your mind...is too weak.
Argh!
Huff... The noise is reduced a little.
Urgh... The head... Too much noise...
Task...complete.
Sorry. ...Nrh, my head is pounding.
How...fortunate... We managed to end this while I was sane.
Hngh... The electric discharge was too intense. It hurts...but at least it's over.
Gah... My head... Is everyone else's psyche alright?
